prism

Class PrismComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • prism.PrismComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackwardsReach, Bisimulation, BRTDP, BRTDPModelChecker, ConstructModel, ECComputer, ECComputer, ExplicitFiles2Model, ExplicitFiles2ModulesFile, FastAdaptiveUniformisation, FastAdaptiveUniformisationModelChecker, LTL2DA, LTL2NBA, LTL2WDBA, LTLModelChecker, LTLModelChecker, MCTSModelChecker, ModelBuilder, Modules2PTA, MultiObjModelChecker, ParamModelChecker, Prism, PTAModelChecker, QuantAbstractRefine, SCCComputer, SCCComputer, SimulatorEngine, StateModelChecker, StateModelChecker, UCT, Updater, ValueComputer

    public class PrismComponent
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for "components" of PRISM, i.e. classes that implement a particular piece of functionality required for model checking. Stores:
    • A PrismLog (mainLog) for output
    • A PrismSettings object (settings)
    Depending on the (sub)class, the settings object may either be read from each time that a setting is required (thus respecting any changes that are made to it over time), or read from initially and then ignored. Mostly, these classes are freshly created to perform some task and then discarded, so there is no point making changes to settings after creation.

    • Field Detail

      • mainLog

        protected PrismLog mainLog
        Log for output. Defaults to System.out, so that is always available.

      • settings

        protected PrismSettings settings
        PRISM settings object. Defaults to null to avoid delays when it will be copied from a parent object.
